text.section: An applicant for an initial license shall file with the Commissioner an application on the form that the Commissioner provides.

An application shall be signed under oath:
in the case of an individual applicant, by the applicant; or
in the case of an applicant that is a business entity, by an individual who has direct control over its fiscal management, an owner, partner, member, or manager of the business entity, or a director of a business entity that is a corporation.
